  • Constructor Details

    • Battle

      public Battle(Trainer trainer1, Trainer trainer2)
      Constructor for creating a new battle between two trainers
      Parameters:
      trainer1 - The first trainer in the battle
      trainer2 - The second trainer in the battle

  • Method Details

    • executeMovement

      public void executeMovement(String move) throws PoobkemonException
      Executes a movement/attack for the current trainer Updates battle state and determines AI's next decision
      Parameters:
      move - The name of the movement to execute
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If there is an issue executing the movement

    • changePokemon

      public void changePokemon(String pokemon) throws PoobkemonException
      Changes the current trainer's active Pokemon Updates battle state and determines AI's next decision
      Parameters:
      pokemon - The name of the Pokemon to switch to
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If there is an issue changing the Pokemon

    • useItem

      public void useItem(String item) throws PoobkemonException
      Uses an item from the current trainer's inventory Updates battle state afterward
      Parameters:
      item - The name of the item to use
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If there is an issue using the item

    • afterAction

      public void afterAction() throws PoobkemonException
      Performs post-action checks Checks if the battle state has changed after an action
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException

    • verifyTurnMachine

      public void verifyTurnMachine()
      Verifies if an AI trainer's turn should be advanced If the last action indicates the AI isn't deciding, advances to the next turn

    • getMovementsStringCurrent

      public ArrayList<String> getMovementsStringCurrent()
      Gets a list of movement names available to the current trainer's Pokemon
      Returns:
      ArrayList of movement names

    • getMovementsStringOponent

      public ArrayList<String> getMovementsStringOponent()
      Gets a list of movement names available to the opponent's Pokemon
      Returns:
      ArrayList of movement names

    • getPPInBattle

      public int getPPInBattle(String name) throws PoobkemonException
      Gets the remaining PP (Power Points) for a specific move in battle
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the move
      Returns:
      The remaining PP for the specified move
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If the move is not found

    • resetTurn

      public void resetTurn()
      Resets the turn back to the first trainer

    • huir

      public void huir()
      Placeholder method for implementing a flee/escape battle mechanic

    • isOver

      public boolean isOver()
      Checks if the battle is over
      Returns:
      true if the battle has ended, false otherwise

    • getWinner

      public String getWinner()
      Gets the winning trainer
      Returns:
      The trainer who won the battle, or null if the battle is ongoing

    • coinToss

      public boolean coinToss()
      Performs a coin toss to randomly determine which trainer goes first Prints the result to the console
      Returns:
      The result of the coin toss (true for heads, false for tails)
